tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Spontaneous Delivery,Childbirth,
review:
I would like to share my remarkable experience with Motherhood Hospital, Special Thanks to Dr Rashmi Patil mam and her team who played a crucial role in my pregnancy & delivery Journey. We consulted mam in 9th Month only. I had many doubts before going to hospital but once I met her everything is cleared. I was looking for a doctor who would help me get a normal delivery & Dr Rashmi is the right one. She listened and gave advice even during the delivery time & tried to do normal delivery till last minute.
One of the qualities that truly sets Dr Rashmi Patil mam apart is her ability to make her patients feel comfortable & ease. She takes time to listen attentively to any concerns or questions asked & provides clear & concise explanations. She explains situation and respects your opinion. She doesn‚Äôt corner you to make tough decisions without providing proper information.
I whole heartedly recommend her to anyone seeking exceptional gynaecological care. We are forever grateful for her.
Facilities at Motherhood hospital were top notch. They focus mainly on personalized care. Staff are very cooperative; rooms are clean & comfortable. Overall Motherhood Hospital offers Quality care & support for families during precious moments of childbirth. I am glad that I chooses right hospital & best doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently underwent surgery at Motherhood Hospital Banashankari with Dr. Rashmi Patil and her team. From the initial consultation until discharge, Dr. Rashmi Patil was incredibly gentle, patient, and attentive. She thoroughly understood my concerns and took the time to patiently clear all my doubts and apprehensions regarding the surgery and postoperative care. Her calm demeanor and support significantly helped me manage my anxiety.
The patient care at Motherhood Banashankari was fabulous. From my admission to discharge the process was smooth and hassle-free. The rooms were impeccably clean.I would also like to thank all the nurses and the patient care team, who took excellent care of me during my post-op period.
Overall, Dr. Rashmi Patil and her team were fabulous, and Motherhood Banashankari truly demonstrates a deep commitment to patient care. Thank you all for making this experience as comfortable and reassuring as possible.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your wonderful words ‚ù§Ô∏è

review: I had a consultation with Dr Rashmi Patil via a referral. She was very quick to respond and patiently saw all my reports on telephone which led her to quickly schedule a surgery for me. Everything was ready by the time I reached hospital. There was no wait game for anything, everything was just a cake walk with her and the hospital staff was also very cordial in taking care and explaining every step to me. All in all it was a great experience and I would recommend this hospital to any women looking for a trustworthy medical experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I am thrilled to write a review for our incredible Doctor, Rashmi Patil, who possesses not only exceptional knowledge but also countless degrees and certifications. From the moment we started our journey with her, it was evident that we had found a true gem in the field of healthcare.

Dr. Rashmi Patil, has consistently demonstrated her unwavering patience in addressing all our concerns and even our silliest doubts. She goes above and beyond to ensure that we feel heard and well-informed during every visit. Her availability during emergencies has been a source of tremendous reassurance for our family.

Most of the doctors will not spend enough time with you. They just want to finish and move on to the next patient. This one is totally different. She will not rush her treatment or analysis and will always give enough time for her patients.

During my wife's second pregnancy, Dr. Rashmi played a pivotal role in ensuring a smooth and healthy journey. Her remarkable experience allowed her to handle complications during the delivery with ease, putting our minds at ease during a potentially stressful time.

What truly sets her apart is her ability to provide both medical expertise and emotional support. She walked us through the entire process, offering guidance and comfort whenever required. Her exceptional memory meant that we never had to repeat anything we had discussed, even from six months prior. It's evident that she genuinely cares about her patients' well-being and invests in their care on a personal level.

Thanks to Dr. Rashmi, our baby and my wife are not only healthy but thriving. We consider ourselves incredibly fortunate to have found such an outstanding doctor who has made this journey a positive and memorable one. She is a true gem of a person, and we feel truly blessed to have her as our trusted healthcare provider.
reply_text: Thank you so much sir for your kind words üôè God bless you all üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude and share my wonderful experience with Dr. Rashmi Patil. As my maternity doctor, from the very first visit to the delivery and beyond, you have provided exceptional care and support, making my journey into motherhood a truly positive and memorable one.

Throughout my prenatal visits, you consistently demonstrated a high level of expertise, professionalism, and compassion. Your ability to attentively listen to my concerns, answer my questions in detail, and provide clear explanations regarding the various stages of pregnancy was truly remarkable. I always felt comfortable and reassured under your care, knowing that I was in capable hands.

During the labor and delivery process, your calm and reassuring presence made all the difference. Your guidance and expertise helped me feel empowered and confident, even during the most intense moments. Your exceptional communication skills ensured that both my partner and I were well informed about each step and decision along the way, allowing us to actively participate in the birthing experience.

Moreover, your dedication to ensuring my well-being and that of my baby was evident in the personalized attention and care you provided. You consistently went above and beyond to ensure that all my concerns were addressed promptly, and you made yourself available for any additional support needed.

I am immensely grateful for the positive impact you have had on my journey to motherhood. You also showed genuine empathy and kindness. Your warm demeanor and supportive nature created a trusting and comfortable environment, making me feel valued and cared for as an individual, not just as a patient. Your expertise, professionalism, and compassion are truly commendable, and I would wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Rashmi Patil to any expecting mother in need of exceptional prenatal and maternity care.

Thank you once again for your outstanding care and for making this special chapter in my life a truly memorable one.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your wonderful words.. God bless you all üôè

review:
As we were new to city we were not very sure where should we consult for my pregnancy check up. luckily we got to know about Dr.Rashmi from our family doctor and I am glad to get to know and meet her.
Dr.Rashmi is more than a doctor to me, she is like a sister who gave me emotional strength and made me strong throughout my pregnancy and after my delivery as well.
I used to be eager to meet her on my every consultation as she used to sit with us without rushing up like a family member and clear all our pregnancy related doubts.

During my labour, I holded her hands tightly whenever she was with me like my sister. Her support definately calmed me down during my labour. After my delivery, she had given attention to all the details which are to be taken care and explained me well.

I Really appreciate and be thankful to Dr.Rashmi for her availablity to her patients, be it day or night, she always responded us when ever help needed, be it a phone call or a message.

Thank you so much Dr.Rashmi üòä

review: Would love to express my review by  saying what a wonderful Dr. Rashmi Patil is.  From the very first day, my first appointment she made me feel so comfortable.  There was no fear of any sort after my first conversation with her, i knew i was in the best hands.  Dr. Rashmi is incredible and highly knowledgeable, more than anything extremely sensitive.  I was made to feel at ease and felt confident in recieving expert medical advice.  She is extremely understanding and listens to your concerns. Her demeanor really put me at ease.  I underwent a hysterectomy and she did it so perfectly and was there to support me even after the surgery and continued guiding me even after my discharge.  She holds a lot of human values which is a rare quality these days in the above practice these days. Ever since my experience i have recommended her to a lot of my relatives and friends and they all have the same opinion as mine, saying that DR. review: Visited Ramakrishna hospital for a health check up for my mother in law and met Dr Rashmi then. From then on the entire experience with Dr Rashmi has been nothing short of amazing. She was extremely professional in explaining what the problem was and what the options available were. No procedure was forced on us. The entire decision making was left to us and the pro's and con's of all the options were clearly explained. She never forced us to make decisions in a hurry and gave us the time we needed to make them. She was the brightest spot during the entire hospital stay that my mother-in-law had to go through. Even the post surgery interaction during check-ups was really good and extremely satisfying. The u.s.p of Dr Rashmi definitely has to be the extreme levels of patience in explaining things no matter how many times it is asked and also the fact that she has no superiority heir about her because she is a doctor. She is an extremely humble person and a wonderful person to interact with for any medical advice. Kudos to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Rashmi Patil for more than a year, for unexplained infertility and treatment, and for pregnancy. I read reviews on practo and decided to go to her, as I wanted a kind and friendly doctor. And she's more than that! I'm so glad to have found her and feel lucky to have been under her care. She is the most gentle obgyn one might find (her TV scans are never hurtful). She cares for her patients so well and so kindly. Her approach to treatment methods are very assuring. I felt that she is very up-to-date in her field. She's approachable any time for advice and help. I could ask any question related to pregnancy without feeling being judged. I had a difficult labor but with Dr. Rashmi's presence and care, I didn't worry even for a moment for wellbeing of me and my baby. I'm forever grateful to her for her care and guidance through this journey. ******* ****** ***** *** ** *** *****
reply_text: Thank you dear.. God bless you all.. üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Rashmi Patil is a very friendly doctor. I had visited for my pre conception counselling. She answered all my queries patiently. She explained me how I should be in best of my health before getting pregnant, what medicine will help me in conceiving and for having healthy baby. In this current time, it is hard to find doctor like her who gives you so much of care and time. She prescribed minimal tests to check my wellbeing. She also encouraged that it's essential to aim for smooth pregnancy and vaginal birth and cesareans are advised only for emergency situations. Glad that I met a doctor like her and hoping to get pregnant soon and come here for my pregnancy care. Thank you Dr Rashmi.

During our consultation, we came to know that she is also pregnant and we were in tension whether she will able to help us during our delivery as ours was a C-section case and bit complicated. But she assured us that she only do the surgery and she did it. After 3 weeks of our delivery, she also delivered a kid. It's not ending here.. post delivery, my wife suffered with PDP and she guided us towards appropriate treatment. She personally called my wife to counselling and ask her status on PDP.
